Reference

All functions

Ingredients() show(<Ingredients>) names(<Ingredients>) amounts() units() as.data.frame(<Ingredients>)

S4 class containing names, amounts and units for ingredients

RecipeBook() show(<RecipeBook>) names(<RecipeBook>) length(<RecipeBook>) recipes() meal_plan() shopping_list() favourites() `recipes<-`()

S4 class containing recipes, their ingredients and meal plans

recipebook_example

An example recipe book

create_meal_plan()

Create a meal plan

create_shopping_list()

Create a shopping list

read_ingredients()

Read in a list of ingredients from a character vector

recipes_example

Set of example recipes

add_favourites() rm_favourites()

Add or remove favourite recipes

weekdays()

Obtain the weekdays of interest
